title: Enhancing Leadership Practical Competencies: Fundamentals of Robotic Manipulator Safety Control: Learning through Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematical concepts (functions, graphs, simple physics laws)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will explain at least three output constraint conditions (e.g., speed limits, force restrictions) that may occur in robotic manipulator movements.
Learners will design and test a control system incorporating output constraints at least once using simulation tools.
Learners will graphically analyze whether a robot tracks a target trajectory under constraints and achieve at least 80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
